name: peng
text:
you know, i don't know if being that open is a good or a bad thing.
 
 
i cannot for the life of me keep anger inside or at bay. while i am "inis" it
comes out as rants then disappears. healthy for me, i guess, but for other
people who have to bear with the grumpy, growling penguin?
 
 
good luck on that lovelife quest. hehe.
